main event: A civilian woman observed a star-like UFO over Westhampton Beach, New York for approximately 3.5 hours on 12 March 1953.
interesting points: The object was first perceived as a small star-like object traveling in an erratic manner., Mrs. c------, a member of the Civil Defense Ground Observer Corps, observed it from a school tower and described it as yellow and stationary for a period., Captain Cohen also observed the object, noting it appeared as a bright yellow light and remained mostly stationary., Several witnesses, including Mrs. c------'s daughter and a friend, corroborated the sighting and described it as unlike anything they had seen before., The conclusion of the investigation was that the sighting could be attributed to astronomical phenomena.
witness description: Civilian observers including a Civil Defense Ground Observer and her family members.
